headline: Palantir Stock Is Dropping. 3 Reasons It’s in the Selling Crosshairs.
summary: Palantir Technologies  stock was sliding Monday as fears of a global trade war gripped Wall Street.  While the decline followed a broader selloff in tech stocks, Palantir was uniquely positioned in the maelstrom.  Palantir was off 8.3% at its low of the day.

headline: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) Jumps 14% This Quarter After S&P 100 Inclusion
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) recently announced several partnerships, including with Everfox to enhance classified software solutions and with R1 to improve healthcare financial performance, showcasing its focus on expanding AI capabilities. These strategic moves, combined with the company’s addition to the S&P 100, have likely influenced its stock to rise 14% over the last quarter. Amid a broader market downturn with indexes such as the Nasdaq declining 8%, Palantir's stock...

headline: Palantir Stock Is Tanking. 3 Reasons It’s in the Selling Crosshairs.
summary: Palantir Technologies  stock was sliding Monday as fears of a global trade war gripped Wall Street.  While the decline followed a broader selloff in tech stocks, Palantir was uniquely positioned in the maelstrom.  Other notable names in tech were falling ahead of April 2, so-called Liberation Day, when President Donald Trump has promised to unleash a barrage of tariffs.

headline: Prediction: Buying This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock Will Set You Up for Life (And It's Not Palantir)
summary: Palantir Technologies stock has been on a monster run since going public in 2020, with shares up close to 1,000%.  One of my top choices is Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (NYSE: TSM).  Known simply as TSMC, the manufacturer of computer chips can help set investors up for life who buy today.

headline: The Best Stocks to Invest $50,000 in Right Now
summary: You can buy a lot of wonderful things with $50,000 -- a car, a boat, even the trip of a lifetime.  An investment portfolio, on the other hand, can pay you back -- and then some.  With that in mind, let's imagine how to build a hypothetical portfolio with $50,000 -- using three of my favorite growth stocks.
